bug.author: kparichay
bug.summary: Unable to reset single API invoke timeout
bug.description: Setting single API invoke timeout using ml_single_set_timeout considers the input argument of timeout of 0 as invalid. However, this does not allow resetting the timeout to 0 once set to a non-zero value. As timeout == 0 has a meaning, how about allow setting timeout to 0.
